messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: KNOWING kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/6/2003 8:19:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Oh          My         GAWD!!!! ... Did they have children?   (OH, or are THEY the parents of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/6/2003 8:19:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
KathrynJB@... writes:

> On the other hand...this is a woman who referred to her children when they
> were kids as Dumb Fuck 1 and 2.

Oh My GAWD!!!!


>....and kept talking about how
>THIS is how homeschooling should look. I actually started describing
>Unschooling (usually don't bother), and they were enthusiastic.

Did they have children? (OH, or are THEY the parents of Dumb Fucks 1 & 2?
Nah!)

I've found that the schooled mindset seems to be MUCH more ingrained in
PARENTS. My friends who have no children really GET unschooling and are VERY
supportive---even the "educators". It's as if the DAY you have a child---
"education" becomes all-important. Like they can't see any further than a
good school (and we all know how they sell houses! <g>)!

How weird is THAT?

I'm sorry for those two children. And glad Julian has you!

~Kelly



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
